original_title: Sobre un reencuentro momentáneo a la luz de la oscuridad
overview: Roaming through dark streets, Benjamín recognizes a house. After knocking on the door, an old friend opens, scared. It is as if he was waiting for him. Shortly after they exchange greetings, his friend tells him something isn't right: an intruder has gotten into the house.
title: About a fleeting reunion at the light of darkness
